FAQs List

Manage frequently asked questions

This panel allow you to manage all frequently asked questions.

No. Question Answer Status Modify
1 Who owns P2P? The P2P Company is a public company that trades its shares on the New York stock exchange - so we are 'owned' by our thousands of shareholders and investors around the world.
2 What is P2P Zone? Coke Zone is your virtual door to the P2P world, giving you access to great P2P promotions, events and experiences.Currently you can find P2P Zone codes on specially marked packs. You can earn points by entering these codes, to redeem for rewards and prize draws.
3 What is your annual turnover? In 2010, The P2P Company's turnover (net operating revenue) was $35.119 billion, according to the 2010 annual review.
4 Has P2P GB been involved in any fashion collaborations? Yes. Over the years P2P Great Britain has worked on some exciting collaborations with a variety of British and international fashion brands.
5 How many countries sell P2P products? P2P products are sold in more than 200 countries throughout the world, so it's difficult to think of a country where it's not available. Even in countries where we do not manufacture P2P, it is nearly always available, as many entrepreneurs will import it from neighbouring countries.
